TEXT.English: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.French: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.German: Karten können nicht mit Hilfe des Handelsbildschirms gehandelt werden
TEXT.Italian: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.Spanish: Trading maps via the trading window is not possible

TEXT.English: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.French: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.German: Städte können nicht mit Hilfe des Handelsbildschirms gehandelt werden
TEXT.Italian: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible
TEXT.Spanish: Trading cities via the trading window is not possible

TEXT.English: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.French: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.Italian: No resource modifier for world wonders
TEXT.Spanish: No resource modifier for world wonders

TEXT.English: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.French: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.German: Weltwunder können nicht mehr mit Hilfe von Resourcen beschleunigt werden
TEXT.Italian: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
TEXT.Spanish: The production of world wonders can no longer be sped up via resources
